DOC.brief_summary: Double-blind , randomize placebo-controlled study type 2 diabetes dyslipidemic patients.Patients randomize one four treatment arm 16 week : placebo , fenofibrate , metformin , metformin fenofibrate combination .
DOC.brief_title: Fenofibrate Metformin Insulin Sensitivity Type 2 Diabetics Study
DOC.criteria: Patients type 2 diabetes mellitus dyslipidemia . Type 1 diabetes .
